plugin.name: autostart
plugin._long: A plugin to run shell commands on startup.

group._long: Specifies the shell commands to run on startup.

option.name: autostart
option._long: Executes shell command with `sh` on startup. The program ID does not matter, but must be different for distinct commands.

option.name: autostart_wf_shell
option._long: Start wf-panel and wf-background if they are not listed as autostart entries.
